description:
Christmas Begins ...
The Christmas show opens with all the boys gathered around sitting on the couch, the floor, the arms of chairs so everyone can squeeze in the picture in from of the Christmas tree. Everyone is enjoying their beverage of choice and all the men are dressed in gold tuxedo vests and bow ties along with sexy white boxers. The twins have on burgundy vests and black bow ties to set them apart. Kaden is missing and the boys say he couldn't make it, but they've brought us another present and it's over to the right of the couch wrapped in shiny silver paper. Suddenly it starts to move and Kaden rips it open, revealing his sexy body in his Christmas attire, matching the crowd. The chatroom is full of viewers on The Active LIVE Interface and all the boys chat with the folks watching this all happen LIVE. All the boys give a big toast to our LIVE audience and I begin to make the introductions.

The Introductions ...
The guys are looking absolutely stunning, the colors so vivid, the smiles so vibrant. You can tell this is a room full of happiness and that everyone is really glad (if not in awe) to actually be here. The Christmas music is playing softly in the background as I just look at the beauty before me and decide we should introduce everyone.

There was someone here that no one had every met except in our War Chest Updates---Payne. I had hoped that bringing Payne to the party, we'd get him to go a little further in his bonding experiences, we didn't quite get that, but he did keep a raging hard-on the entire time and in the Extra's part of the second disc, we get an extra special look at him. We'll also be seeing more of him soon, taking things to another level. Ho, ho, ho. There's something about Payne that just drives me crazy. He's short, stout and built like a little brick shithouse. And that uncut cock is heaven. We won't even mention the butt.

I was glad that Zack could make the Christmas party as he goes way, way back here at Active Duty. All the way back to our sixteenth video release, Cum Hungry Grunts. Zack is very special and having him back looking better than ever (at 29 years old) was a really special treat. Zack become the 'housemother' of sorts and was very helpful throughout the whole process in keeping the house clean and helping feed the others. His maturity only hidden by the young man inside that comes alive when the camera's come on.

Kasey steps up to the plate looking like someone famous that shouldn't be among us. His stunning beauty and just overall manliness coupled with that boyish smile and shy sorta way always wins me over. My first memories of Kasey were in a John Deere hat, driving a Chevy pick-up truck. He's the epitome of small-town with big dreams and equal potential. Kasey has become a fan favorite here at Active Duty and looking at him shine tonight, you see why.

Our beloved angelic-boy-gone-bad Kaden makes his way before the camera and he's so breath-taking that you almost need an oxygen tank to take his presence. This Texas boy is what every gay man dreams of when he first starts dreaming about men. His straight, bright white smile and flush cheeks, that smooth, near perfect skin and his loving personality melts you into submission. His country accent and his awe shucks demeanor is disarming but watch out, he's packing the goods to make you explode. Kaden was my first San Diego love I guess you could say. He was the very first sailor I met after arriving and our relationship and its evolution has been one of the best experiences of my life.

Those wild twins are up next and they're always up to something. These two are such rivals and watching their intensity toward one another has always been amusing to the rest of us at AD. The twins are beloved parts of our family. After all, shouldn't every big family have their own set? They are rougher around the edges, blunt and very matter-of-fact about what they like or don't like. They're our revolutionist I guess you could say, our banditos. Deep down they are two of the sweetest guys you could ever hope to meet, simple-loving, street-smart, and the exact definition of scamp.

We continue the introductions with Colin, Damien, Adam, Hops, Christian, Reese and Brock saying hello to the LIVE audience.

King Cole's Cameo ...
This part of the party really had me choked up. It was all I could do to choke back the tears of joy and just strong emotion. Cole had agreed to join us for the Christmas party to help film and be with us, but made it clear he wasn't comfortable with being on film again just yet. I had originally made the silver wrapped box that Kaden came out of for Cole, but when he laid the news on me that he wasn't going to appear, I switched the plan 20 minutes before the feed went live and put Kaden in it. The little shit would come back to surprise me later by coming out dressed in a tuxedo vest, bowtie and white boxers and I'm not sure if the rest of those rascals knew his plan or not, but I almost cried. I realized at that moment how everything doesn't always have to be on 'our' terms, by them being on someone elses could sometimes be magical. Cole punked me on this one. He had not appeared on video in close to eighteen months and I had sorely missed working with him. But during that time off he's become a very valuable part of the AD family behind the scenes. Like with everything he appears in, Cole stole his portion of the show and I was glad he did. It would not be until four months later when he would decide to slowly make a comeback in front of the camera.

Santa Makes His Rounds ...
It's gift-giving time and Santa always has the good gifts. We let the guys sit in the Christmas throne one-by-one to receive their presents. Everyone was wide-eyed as they opened gifts from lap tops to Xbox 360 or Playstations and all the accessories. Each year Santa give the guys five things to choose from and gets them one of those five things so that it's still a surprise.

The twins come up to get their presents talking shit as always, but find themselves pleasantly surprised I do believe. All the guys razz the twins as they open their gifts and Damien follows the twins and he's followed by Hops, Kasey, and all the rest. The gift opening session is really like an Active Duty LIVE Friars Roast. All the boys give each other shit and I join in the fun.

title: Active Duty Live: Christmas 2008
